placeholders.pulses: Here you will find all the pulses you created or participate in.

placeholders.shortDescription: One paragraph, but a very good one!
placeholders.description: Tell us more about your Pulse
placeholders.event: To find people for your event: events, product announcements, etc.
placeholders.project: To find people for your project: teams for competitions, startups, etc.
placeholders.images: One photo is required. We recommend uploading at least 3 photos.
placeholders.avatar: The first photo in the list will be the pulse avatar.

aboutApp.title: About the app, help
aboutApp.aboutApp: "Together" app is designed to help you find like-minded people and implement your coolest ideas.
aboutApp.aboutCommunity: The app is developed by the community of the same name. More information about us can be found in
aboutApp.vkGroup: the official VK group of the application.

complaints.title: Create Complaint
complaints.placeholder: Tell us in detail what seems suspicious about the impulse
complaints.info: Does this impulse seem suspicious to you? Here you can file a complaint about the impulse. Moderators will review it.
